verses.verse: רְדִ֣י ׀ <WH3381> Come down וּשְׁבִ֣י <WH3427> and sit עַל־ <WH5921> in עָפָ֗ר <WH6083> in the dust בְּתוּלַת֙ <WH1330> O virgin בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon שְׁבִי־ <WH3427> sit לָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> on the ground אֵין־ <WH369> without כִּסֵּ֖א <WH3678> [there is] no throne בַּת־ <WH1323> O daughter כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> shall no תוֹסִ֙יפִי֙ <WH3254> for thou shalt no more יִקְרְאוּ־ <WH7121> be called לָ֔ךְ רַכָּ֖ה <WH7390> tender וַעֲנֻגָּֽה׃ <WH6028> and delicate

קְחִ֥י <WH3947> Take רֵחַ֖יִם <WH7347> the millstones וְטַ֣חֲנִי <WH2912> and grind קָ֑מַח <WH7058> meal גַּלִּ֨י <WH1540> uncover צַמָּתֵ֧ךְ <WH6777> thy locks חֶשְׂפִּי־ <WH2834> make bare שֹׁ֛בֶל <WH7640> the leg גַּלִּי־ <WH1540> uncover שׁ֖וֹק <WH7785> the thigh עִבְרִ֥י <WH5674> pass over נְהָרֽוֹת׃ <WH5104> the rivers

תִּגָּל֙ <WH1540> shall be uncovered עֶרְוָתֵ֔ךְ <WH6172> Thy nakedness גַּ֥ם <WH1571> also תֵּרָאֶ֖ה <WH7200> shall be seen חֶרְפָּתֵ֑ךְ <WH2781> yea thy shame נָקָ֣ם <WH5359> vengeance אֶקָּ֔ח <WH3947> I will take וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and will not אֶפְגַּ֖ע <WH6293> and I will not meet אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> [thee as] a man ס
גֹּאֲלֵ֕נוּ <WH1350> [As for] our redeemer יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> [is] his name קְד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

שְׁבִ֥י <WH3427> Sit דוּמָ֛ם <WH1748> thou silent וּבֹ֥אִי <WH935> and get בַחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <WH2822> thee into darkness בַּת־ <WH1323> O daughter כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> will no תוֹסִ֙יפִי֙ <WH3254> for thou shalt no more יִקְרְאוּ־ <WH7121> be called לָ֔ךְ גְּבֶ֖רֶת <WH1404> The lady מַמְלָכֽוֹת׃ <WH4467> of kingdoms

קָצַ֣פְתִּי <WH7107> I was wroth עַל־ <WH5921> with עַמִּ֗י <WH5971> with my people חִלַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <WH2490> I have polluted נַחֲלָתִ֔י <WH5159> mine inheritance וָאֶתְּנֵ֖ם <WH5414> and given בְּיָדֵ֑ךְ <WH3027> them into thine hand לֹא־ <WH3808> did not שַׂ֤מְתְּ <WH7760> thou didst shew לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> like רַחֲמִ֔ים <WH7356> them no mercy עַל־ <WH5921> unto זָקֵ֕ן <WH2205> upon the ancient הִכְבַּ֥דְתְּ <WH3513> heavily עֻלֵּ֖ךְ <WH5923> laid thy yoke מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> hast thou very

וַתֹּ֣אמְרִ֔י <WH559> And thou saidst לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for ever אֶהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will be a גְבָ֑רֶת <WH1404> I shall be a lady עַ֣ד <WH5704> against לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor שַׂ֥מְתְּ <WH7760> [so] that thou didst not lay אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> things עַל־ <WH5921> and לִבֵּ֔ךְ <WH3820> these [things] to thy heart לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor זָכַ֖רְתְּ <WH2142> neither didst remember אַחֲרִיתָֽהּ׃ <WH319> the latter end ס

וְעַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> Now שִׁמְעִי־ <WH8085> Therefore hear זֹ֤את <WH2063> you עֲדִינָה֙ <WH5719> now this [thou that art] given to pleasures הַיּוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> that dwellest לָבֶ֔טַח <WH983> carelessly הָאֹֽמְרָה֙ <WH559> that sayest בִּלְבָ֔בָהּ <WH3824> in thine heart אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am וְאַפְסִ֣י <WH657> I [am] and none else ע֑וֹד <WH5750> besides לֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor אֵשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> beside me I shall not sit אַלְמָנָ֔ה <WH490> [as] a widow וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor אֵדַ֖ע <WH3045> neither shall I know שְׁכֽוֹל׃ <WH7908> the loss of children

וְתָבֹאנָה֩ <WH935> [things] shall come לָּ֨ךְ שְׁתֵּי־ <WH8147> But these two אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these רֶ֛גַע <WH7281> to thee in a moment בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> in one שְׁכ֣וֹל <WH7908> the loss of children וְאַלְמֹ֑ן <WH489> and widowhood כְּתֻמָּם֙ <WH8537> upon thee in their perfection בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> they shall come עָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5921> and בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> for the multitude כְּשָׁפַ֔יִךְ <WH3785> of thy sorceries בְּעָצְמַ֥ת <WH6109> abundance חֲבָרַ֖יִךְ <WH2267> of thine enchantments מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> [and] for the great

וַתִּבְטְחִ֣י <WH982> For thou hast trusted בְרָעָתֵ֗ךְ <WH7451> in thy wickedness אָמַרְתְּ֙ <WH559> thou hast said אֵ֣ין <WH369> No רֹאָ֔נִי <WH7200> None seeth חָכְמָתֵ֥ךְ <WH2451> me Thy wisdom וְדַעְתֵּ֖ךְ <WH1847> and thy knowledge הִ֣יא <WH1931> they שׁוֹבְבָ֑תֶךְ <WH7725> it hath perverted וַתֹּאמְרִ֣י <WH559> thee and thou hast said בְלִבֵּ֔ךְ <WH3820> in thine heart אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am וְאַפְסִ֥י <WH657> I [am] and none else עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> besides

וּבָ֧א <WH935> come עָלַ֣יִךְ <WH5921> and רָעָ֗ה <WH7451> Therefore shall evil לֹ֤א <WH3808> you will not תֵדְעִי֙ <WH3045> upon thee thou shalt not know שַׁחְרָ֔הּ <WH7837> from whence it riseth וְתִפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> shall fall עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> and הֹוָ֔ה <WH1943> and mischief לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תוּכְלִ֖י <WH3201> upon thee thou shalt not be able כַּפְּרָ֑הּ <WH3722> to put it off וְתָבֹ֨א <WH935> shall come עָלַ֧יִךְ <WH5921> on פִּתְאֹ֛ם <WH6597> upon thee suddenly שׁוֹאָ֖ה <WH7722> and desolation לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֵדָֽעִי׃ <WH3045> [which] thou shalt not know

עִמְדִי־ <WH5975> Stand נָ֤א <WH4994> now בַחֲבָרַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH2267> now with thine enchantments וּבְרֹ֣ב <WH7230> and with the multitude כְּשָׁפַ֔יִךְ <WH3785> of thy sorceries בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> wherein יָגַ֖עַתְּ <WH3021> thou hast laboured מִנְּעוּרָ֑יִךְ <WH5271> from thy youth אוּלַ֛י <WH194> Perhaps תּוּכְלִ֥י <WH3201> if so be thou shalt be able הוֹעִ֖יל <WH3276> to profit אוּלַ֥י <WH194> Perhaps תַּעֲרֽוֹצִי׃ <WH6206> if so be thou mayest prevail

נִלְאֵ֖ית <WH3811> Thou art wearied בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> in the multitude עֲצָתָ֑יִךְ <WH6098> of thy counsels יַעַמְדוּ־ <WH5975> stand up נָ֨א <WH4994> now וְיוֹשִׁיעֻ֜ךְ <WH3467> and save [הָבְרוּ כ] (הֹבְרֵ֣י <WH1895> astrologer ק) שָׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> air הַֽחֹזִים֙ <WH2374> agreement בַּכּ֣וֹכָבִ֔ים <WH3556> the stars מֽוֹדִיעִם֙ <WH3045> prognosticators לֶחֳדָשִׁ֔ים <WH2320> the monthly מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what יָבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> thee from [these things] that shall come עָלָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5921> and

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold הָי֤וּ <WH1961> have become כְקַשׁ֙ <WH7179> Behold they shall be as stubble אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> the fire שְׂרָפָ֔תַם <WH8313> shall burn לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יַצִּ֥ילוּ <WH5337> them they shall not deliver אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשָׁ֖ם <WH5315> themselves מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> from the power לֶֽהָבָ֑ה <WH3852> of the flame אֵין־ <WH369> There גַּחֶ֣לֶת <WH1513> [there shall] not [be] a coal לַחְמָ֔ם <WH2552> to warm א֖וּר <WH217> at [nor] fire לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> to sit נֶגְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH5048> before

כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> So הָיוּ־ <WH1961> become לָ֖ךְ אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom יָגָ֑עַתְּ <WH3021> Thus shall they be unto thee with whom thou hast laboured סֹחֲרַ֣יִךְ <WH5503> [even] thy merchants מִנְּעוּרַ֗יִךְ <WH5271> from thy youth אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> every one לְעֶבְרוֹ֙ <WH5676> to his quarter תָּע֔וּ <WH8582> they shall wander אֵ֖ין <WH369> There מוֹשִׁיעֵֽךְ׃ <WH3467> none shall save ס
